ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Shows how to create a Gantt chart
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Gantt Chart demo showcases a timeline of a project.
It uses the FastStripeRenderableSeries which requires the StripeDataSeries as data source.
The DiscontinuousDateTimeAxis on the top shows the timeline and excludes weekends using the Calendar with time ranges to skip.
The left panel lists project activities with information about task, department and percentage of completion.
The VerticalLineAnnotation shows the end date of the project. The VerticalSliceModifier shows the current date and it can be used to overview the progress of the project.
[b]The following interactions are possible:[/b]
- [b][Mouse Wheel][/b] [i]Zooming data in and out[/i]
- [b][CTRL + Mouse Wheel][/b] [i]Scrolling data up and down[/i]
- [b][SHIFT + Mouse Wheel][/b] - Click and drag [b][Left Mouse Button][/b] [i]Panning data left and right[/i]
- Double-click [b][Left Mouse Button][/b] [i]Zooming to data extents[/i]
